text:
This handler currently trims off everything before the last ':' character, 
when it should just trim to the first ':' character.  Attached is a patch with 
a less-greedy expression.
creator: matt@thebishops.org
matt@thebishops.org
text:
Created attachment 4419
patches expression in SimpleP4OutputHandler.java

creator: conor@apache.org
text: Applied - thanks - can you test that this works as expected.

I have tested the change. I do not know which P4 tasks did output which is 
impacted by the change. P4 tasks still work


The output for this snippet here is not affected by the change


<project name="test">


<mkdir dir="/dev/depot/subdir"/>


<echo file="/dev/depot/subdir/montest2">


bonjour


ceci est mon test


</echo>


<p4change description="newfile"/>


<p4add changelist="${p4.change}">


<fileset dir="/dev/depot" includes="**/*montest2"/>


</p4add>


<p4submit change="${p4.change}"/>


</project>


Here is the output




C:\dev\testant>ant -f build1.xml


Buildfile: build1.xml


 [p4change] Change Number is 106


    [p4add] Execing add -c 106  "C:\dev\depot\subdir\montest2"


    [p4add] //depot/subdir/montest2#1 - opened for add




BUILD SUCCESSFUL


Total time: 3 seconds
creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
